Class CheckersLogic

CheckersLogic contains the logic of a checkers game

    • isValid

      public static boolean isValid(int[] coordinates, CheckerBoard board)
      Checks if a move is legal.
      Parameters:
      coordinates - Array containing the starting row, starting column, finishing row, and finishing column of the move to be checked.
      board - The CheckerBoard being played on.
      Returns:
      If the move is legal.

    • isMoveable

      public static boolean isMoveable(int[] coordinates, CheckerBoard board)
      Checks if a move is a valid single move.
      Parameters:
      coordinates - Array containing the starting row, starting column, finishing row, and finishing column of the move to be checked.
      board - The CheckerBoard being played on.
      Returns:
      If the move is one square forward and one square left or right.

    • isJumpable

      public static boolean isJumpable(int[] coordinates, CheckerBoard board)
      Checks if a move is a valid capturing move.
      Parameters:
      coordinates - Array containing the starting row, starting column, finishing row, and finishing column of the move to be checked.
      board - The CheckerBoard being played on.
      Returns:
      If the move is two squares forward and two squares left or right over an opponent.

    • canMove

      public static boolean canMove(int row, int column, CheckerBoard board)
      Checks if a Square contains a piece which has a valid move available.
      Parameters:
      row - The x coordinate of the Square to check.
      column - The y coordinate of the Square to check.
      board - The CheckerBoard being played on.
      Returns:
      If the Square contains a piece which has a valid move available.

      Checks if the current player has won.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      If the current player has won.
